column5: 2 days until Muskie opens on the Ottawa. Like every year I have taken the day off. Going to fish Saturday as well. Hope to get myself one of these!
I hear ya Matt, I got this pretty lady last year on the opening week on Nippissing and will be back up there next week looking for her momma.  Good luck to you this year.

2 days until Muskie opens on the Ottawa. Like every year I have taken the day off. Going to fish Saturday as well. Hope to get myself one of these! Copy of DSCF1372.JPG   So your sayin ya need fertilizer for the garden??  Actually muskie is the one species I've never sought---caught a few incidentally but never targeted  Fishin willys one day years ago on Wabigoon----hot summer day--dead flat and calm---had a monster come up and roll beside the boat---and kept rollin---had to be well over 50lbs---huge fish
Those are both big fish. Best of luck to both of you.
There's no muskies in the Ottawa
There's no muskies in the Ottawa Ya I seen that show where they were'nt catchin any...again and again
See you in two weeks Matt, I assume you'll stop by the Rouleau for a beer?
See you in two weeks Matt, I assume you'll stop by the Rouleau for a beer? You know it Dax, more than just a stop buy my friend!

I hear ya Matt, I got this pretty lady last year on the opening week on Nippissing and will be back up there next week looking for her momma.  Good luck to you this year.   Nice fish Lew, opening has been very good to me the last couple years. Good luck to you as well!
